gamePieces

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameMechanics.PhysicsObject
      • gamePieces.GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameBehavior, java.io.Serializable

    public class GameObject
extends PhysicsObject
implements GameBehavior, java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Ethan GameObject, anything that runs in the Game is a GameObject. It represents an Object that the engine know how to run Physics and calculations on. It combines all the features into one Object that it is used to execute gameplay.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
